original_text: You are Israel's king. So why are you chasing after someone like me? I am less important than a dead dog or a little fly!
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕이 누구를 따라 나왔으며 누구의 뒤를 쫓나이까 죽은 개나 벼룩을 쫓음이니이다

sentences.original_text: So why are you chasing after someone like me?
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 왜 나 같은 사람을 쫓고 계십니까?

sentences.original_text: I am less important than a dead dog
